category: Member sport organization regulations/Article 32 (City/provincial sport organization regulations, etc.)
contents: Article 32 (Regulations of city/provincial sports organizations, etc.) ① The composition, operation, reasons for disqualification, etc. of the general meeting and board of directors of city/provincial sports organizations shall be separately determined by the city/provincial sports council in accordance with these regulations. Revised 2017. 3. 23., 2021. 10. 6. ② Deleted 2017. 8. 7. ③ The qualifications for accounting audit during audit may be separately determined by the city/provincial sports council. Newly established 2022. 12. 26.
